alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 12:39AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN ITASCA...SOUTHWESTERN COOK...NORTHEASTERN AITKIN...SOUTHERN ST. LOUIS AND CENTRAL LAKE COUNTIES... At 1239 AM CST, heavy snow showers were along a line extending from 7 miles east of Swan River, to 6 miles south of Meadowlands, to near Canyon, to 11 miles northwest of Larsmont, to 7 miles northwest of Silver Bay, to near Sugar Loaf Cove, and moving southeast at 35 mph. Visibilities of 1/2 mile or less and wind gusts up to 35 mph are expected with these heavy snow showers. These heavy snow showers will be near... Silver Bay, Floodwood, Beaver Bay, Illgen City, Island Lake, Split Rock Lighthouse State Park, Tettegouche State Park, City of Rice Lake, and Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area around 1245 AM CST. Two Harbors, Brookston, Castle Danger, Larsmont, Saginaw, Gooseberry Falls State Park, and Split Rock Lighthouse around 1250 AM CST. Duluth, Hermantown, Knife River, Pike Lake Near Duluth, French River, and Stoney Point around 1255 AM CST. McQuade Harbor around 100 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these heavy snow showers include Seven Beaver Lake, Wales, Fish Lake, Silica, Alborn, Twig, Burnett, Congdon Park, Payne, and Goodland. Be prepared for changing visibility and road conditions. Reduce your speed and allow more space between you and the vehicle in front of you.
